mapper.insert: insert into material (materialid, title, imageurl, season, temperature,calories100g, efficacy, buyguide, trimguide, storeguide) values (material_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{imageurl}, #{season}, #{temperature}, #{calories100g}, #{efficacy}, #{buyguide}, #{trimguide},#{storeguide})
mapper.select: select *from amterial order by materialid desc
mapper.update: update material set title=#{title}, imageurl=#{imageurl}, season=#{season}, temperature=#{temperature}, calories100g=#{calories100g}, efficacy=#{efficact}, buyguide=#{buyguide}, trimguide=#{trimguide}, storeguide=#{storeguide} where materialid =#{materialid}
